title: UNFRUNISHED / FURNISHED. NEAR TRAINS, BUSES. PRIVATE GARDEN... NO FEES
neighborhood: Jamaica / Richmond Hill / Ozone Park / Queens
posting_body: ['NO FEES.', 'APARTMENT WITH YOUR OWN PRIVATE GARDEN...', '25 X 40 GARDEN AREA.', 'JUST BRING YOUR CLOTHES, EVERYTHING IS THERE IN FULLY FURNISHED OPTION.', 'LAUNDRY IS LITERALLY 1 MINUTE WALK.', 'There are two train lines.........', '"A" is two blocks away (5 min walk)', 'The other train line is .............', '"J" is 10 blocks away (12 min walk)', 'Several bus lines (8) also available within 1 to 5 blocks.', 'CALL FOR EXACT RATES..', 'UNFURNISHED.....................$2900 ……... DOES NOT INCLUDE UTILITIES, INTERNET, CABLE, WIFI OR FURNISHINGS.', '.....................................', 'Landscape maintenance is not included.', 'It is mandatory that you do.', 'FULLY-FURNISHED ......…..$3400 ........', 'Monthly and up.', 'Call (Exact rate....', 'Depends on length of stay)', 'Includes all Utilities, (gas, water, electricity), Internet, Cable, All dishes, furniture beds etc walk) .', 'Landscape maintenance included.', 'INCLUDES ALL UTILITIES, (GAS, WATER, ELECTRIC), INTERNET CABLE AND ALL FURNISHINGS, INCLUDING DISHES, TV, STEREO SOFA, BEDS ETC.', 'THERE IS A TV IN EACH ROOM.', 'BUNK BEDS / DOUBLE BEDS AVAILABLE IF NEEDED FREE .', 'HARDWOOD FLOORS IN BEDROOMS.', 'Attention roomates, professionals, Medical students, International workers, and students, families etc.', 'Beautiful 2 bedroom on 2nd floor of private house with 13 large windows .', 'Includes pots, pans, dishes, TV, window treatments, radio/cd combo, garbage bins, AC in every room, sofa etc.', 'All utilities gas, water, electric, high speed internet and premium channel direct Television included in the fully furnished option.', 'Bedrooms are located in the front and back of apartment with living and kitchen area in the middle.', 'This makes it ideal for anyone who wants added privacy as the bedrooms are not next to each other but seperated by the kitchen and living room.', 'Bedroom sizes are approximately 13 x 12 and 17 x 9.', 'Close to transportation, banks, supermarket, doctor offices, pharmacy etc.', 'Buses and train are within 2 to 4 minutes walk.', 'Thirty minutes travel time to manhattan, 15 to 20 minutes to queens mall, green acres mall, JFK and LGA airports.', 'By car to both airports takes about 10 to 20 minutes.....................................................................................Walk to Aqueduct / Racino racetrack.', 'Why pay hundreds more near the financial district when you can rent
